description: Returns the metadata for one service or a list of the metadata for all services. Use this without a service code to get the service codes for all services. Use it with a service code, such as AmazonEC2, to get information specific to that service, such as the attribute names available for that service. For example, some of the attribute names available for EC2 are volumeType, maxIopsVolume, operation, locationType, and instanceCapacity10xlarge.

parameters.name: FormatVersion
parameters.description: The format version that you want the response to be in. Valid values are: aws_v1

nested_items.name: Services
nested_items.description: The service metadata for the service or services in the response.

nested_items.name: ServiceCode
nested_items.description: The code for the Amazon Web Services service.

nested_items.name: AttributeNames
nested_items.description: The attributes that are available for this service.

nested_items.name: FormatVersion
nested_items.description: The format version of the response. For example, aws_v1.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token for the next set of retrievable results.
